Wondrous Item, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)
This hollow cone of beaten brass has a handle on one side. When attuned to the amplifier, you can use an action to sing through it, channeling your voice and magical power into deadly sonic attacks.
The amplifier has 3 charges. You can spend a charge as an action to expend a spell slot and sing through the amplifier. Treat this as a spell attack with a range of 60 feet. On a hit, the target takes 9 (2d8) thunder damage per level of the spell slot. A follower of the Song Undying has advantage on attack rolls using the amplifier and deals 11 (2d10) thunder damage per spell slot level.
The amplifier regains all expended charges daily at dawn.
